name: chat (Bluebacon)
description:
WARNING: Do not send any curse words through the system, if you see one, go in the cloud data and see who sent it, then report their account.

 Space to send messages (click on mobile) 

R to delete chat Commands: 

!chatreset - resets chat 

!ping - plays a ping sound

 !alarm - plays an alarm sound 

!notification - plays a bass boosted notification

 !v - plays a vine boom 

!fard - plays a fart 

!far2 - plays another fart

 !explode - plays an explosion

 !sathisb - says your message in tenor voice

 !sathisg - says your message with alto voice 

!sathiss - says your message with squeak voice 

!sathism - says your message with giant voice 

!nev - plays never gonna give u up

 !beesong - plays npcs are becoming smart song

 !ew - plays "a sound" 

!boo - plays a jumpscare (real) 

!sus - play sus

 !stopsounds - stops all sounds
